Reason: The _snapshotSerializers configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the performance and storage size of the system at the system level. The configuration is used in the create() method to initialize a Prevayler instance, and it determines the serializer used for journaling, which can have a significant impact on execution time and memory consumption. Since the configuration is triggered once during the creation of the Prevayler instance, any time-expensive or memory-expensive operations related to _snapshotSerializers can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
